1.0.name: wordpress/wp-post-to-twitter
1.0.description:
This Wordpress Twitter plugin is a nice simple plugin. All it does is post updates from your blog to your twitter account when you create a fresh post and allows you to tweet from you blog. Some other features are:

* This Plugin Requires CURL *

  • Auto shorten URL’s with tinyurl
  • Manually shorten URL’s with tinyurl from the user interface
  • Validation to make sure you can tweet or warns you if you cant
  • Automatic character limitation to make sure you don’t post anything over 140 characters
  • Good for SEO, creating automatic links to your blog and it’s posts
